import { Button, Container, Stack, Typography, useMediaQuery } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import pic from '../Media/woman-white-blouse-standing-with-books.png' import pic2 from '../Media/Group 9678.png'; export default function Touter({touter}) { const matches = useMediaQuery('(min-width:654px)'); const lang = localStorage.getItem('lang') return (
Become a Tutor {touter.body}
) }
